document_data.name: Valargrim Hond
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Ed Greenwood's Patreon/The Magister: A Look at the Mortal "Gunslinger" Mage of Mystra}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Valargrim Hond''' a mage of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] and the [[Magister]] of [[1490 DR]] to [[1496 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Besides a broad selection of [[ring]]s and [[wand]]s, Valargrim notably wielded three [[enchanted]] flying [[dagger]]s of his own devising, capable of attacking on their own, and channeling his own [[spell]]s. The daggers had a sapience of their own.
document_data.History:
Before becoming the Magister, Valargrim Hond was a mercenary mage who had extensive fighting experience in the [[Vilhon Reach]] and [[Chessenta]]. In the {{yearlinkName|1490}}, after conferring with [[Mystra]], [[Azuth]] offered the office of Magister to Valargrim Hond upon the retirement of [[Tannathra]].

He defended his office through numerous duels until the {{yearlinkName|1496}}, when he was slain in the [[Eyes of the Beholder]] club in [[Ormpetarr]], by six [[Red Wizards]] sent by [[Szass Tam]]. But his slayer never attained the powers of the office, as they were soon after killed by [[Handrar Rezgult]], a [[Zhentarim]] mage who was staying in the city. And before he was able to attain the powers of the office, Valargrim Hond's enchanted daggers struck him down, and then escaped. Thus, [[Azuth]] offered the role of Magister to [[Ramarthant Horaerays]].
